alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Indiana (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:12PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL INDIANA AND EAST CENTRAL ARMSTRONG COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 412 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Indiana, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ernest, Creekside, Plumville, and Atwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
